title: The MVP was launched in 2021, allowing the client to focus completely on growing his business.
firstText: The platform was working stably and required no bug-fixing or further development until Onix handed over the project documentation and code to Kozystayâ€™s in-house IT team in 2024.
secondText: Kozystay plans further apartment booking site development to accommodate business growth. For instance, when Onix was building the booking website, all properties were supplied from a single source. Now, external property owners or managers can also offer apartments or houses for booking. Kozystay also has plans to expand to neighboring regions: Malaysia, Thailand, or Vietnam.
